bill_title: Honoring the 2019 Canton C-Hawk High School football team as champions of the Class 11A football championship.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2019 Canton C-Hawk High School football team as champions of the Class 11A football championship. WHEREAS, the C-Hawks were led by Head Coach Rich Lundstrom, a 1988 graduate of Canton High School; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks were led by seniors Joe Beyke, Sage Darnell, Isaac Dietzenbach, Joey Heikkila, Josh Lane, Wyatt Riffey, Schaeden Scheidt, Jarrett Smith, Sam Stahl, Owen Strand and Kayden Verley; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks lost the first two games of the season to Tea Area and Madison to begin the season 0-2 but persevered to win the next five games by a combined margin of 195-0; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks concluded the season with two more regular season wins and three play-off victories including the 11A state championship game, with a 46-8 victory over Lennox Orioles, and WHEREAS, senior Kayden Verley was honored with the Jim Langer award for his dominant performance during the championship game: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors and commends the 2019 Canton C-Hawk football team and Head Coach Rich Lundstrom, for their achievement of winning the Class 11A football championship.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2019 Canton C-Hawk High School football team as champions of the Class 11A football championship. WHEREAS, the C-Hawks were led by Head Coach Rich Lundstrom, a 1988 graduate of Canton High School; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks were led by seniors Joe Beyke, Sage Darnell, Isaac Dietzenbach, Joey Heikkila, Josh Lane, Wyatt Riffey, Schaeden Scheidt, Jarrett Smith, Sam Stahl, Owen Strand, and Kayden Verley; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks lost the first two games of the season to Tea Area and Madison to begin the season 0-2 but persevered to win the next five games by a combined margin of 195-0; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks concluded the season with two more regular season wins and three playoff victories including the 11A state championship game, with a 46-8 victory over Lennox Orioles, and WHEREAS, senior Kayden Verley was honored with the Jim Langer award for his dominant performance during the championship game: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors and commends the 2019 Canton C-Hawk football team and Head Coach Rich Lundstrom, for their achievement of winning the Class 11A football championship.
